name: Gun Tycoon
description:
Who doesn’t want to be powerful? Weapons give you the ultimate power!

It’s time to build an empire, sell sniper rifles and pistols by the bucket, price them fairly or put them on discount. Test the guns anywhere in the field and ask for the right price to get the money in your pocket! Do you think you can suspect a fake gun? Get on the field and check it out!

Be careful with the customers coming in the store, you never know who plans to sell you a defective gun or cheap weapons! Check and rate the guns right before making an offer. The choice is yours, and so is all that cash. Aim to make a profit in the business to become the biggest gun tycoon!

Gun Tycoon Features:
- Create your gun empire
- Complete freedom to decide prices
- Awesome mini games to complete
- Unlock new levels!
